name: Track of Time (Prototype)
description:
Unfortunately I was not able to finish a working game as I had several difficulties implementing the features in the time given. The uploaded game is only a prototype with very limited gameplay functionality.

Below is a brief of the intended concept.

Gameplay

  • Movement of a train is controlled by the mouse keys
  • Every movement lays a single piece of track and increments the clock by a fixed time. 
  • The player cannot go over tiles that have already been visited
  • The player must arrived at stations at the exact time as shown on the timetable.

Style (concept)

Minimalist subdued style, emulating common transit maps.

Colour theme (concept)

Various shades of grey are used to give depth to gameplay elements and provide a neutral backdrop.

A single highlight colour is used to give greater emphasis to important objects and very between level to indicate progress. 

Highlight colours consist of soft pastel tones are chosen to give a calming and unintimidating play experience.
